scrabble

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrabble.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a scrabble board. A board consists of cells in a square (n*n) grid. A board also contains multipliers. Words are formed on the board by assining letters to those cells. Score is defined by the letters and the multipliers on the board.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    George Piskas

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Default Board Constructor. Creates a 15x15 board of cells.

      • Board

        public Board(int sz)
        Board Constructor with custom size. (>=15) Creates a board of cells and extends the classic 15x15 scrabble board. Also, it adds both the default and extra multiplyers. For custom sizes difrent than 21, you must override the addDefaultMultipliers() function.
        Parameters:
        sz - The size of the Board, must be >=15.

    • Method Detail

      • getCell

        public BoardCell getCell(int x,
                int y)
        Returns a cell with the given coordinates. Warning: x and y start from 0, not 1.
        Parameters:
        x - vertical position
        y - horisontal position
        Returns:
        cell of the given positon

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns board's size.
        Returns:
        size of the board

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns board's information.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Info returned is the size of the board and the info of each cell
